page.title: 06FARMING
page.content: { Mr Hickson,}the farmer of Ropery Farm, owns 80 acres of land and he also rents land from ICI. He has seventy animals, mainly Friesian cows, and two bulls. They keep seven cats to kill vermin. He grows barley and grass for silage. He has a wide range of equipment including manure and fertiliser spreaders, hay bailers, pesticide sprayers, corn drills, tractors, ploughs and a variety of small tools including a shotgun. He employs one person regularly and several people at harvest time. He normally gets up at six a.m. and milks the cows.He then does all the necessary jobs around the farm before milking the cows again in the evening.
